verses.verse: <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O God; for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> in unto my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

I <S%H2883>sink<s%> in <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H3121>mire<s%>, where there is no <S%H4613>standing<s%>: I am <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, where the <S%H7641>floods<s%> overflow <S%H7857>me<s%>.
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> of my <S%H7121>crying<s%>: my <S%H1627>throat<s%> is <S%H2787>dried<s%>: my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> while I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for my <S%H430>God<s%>.

They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%> are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>: they that would <S%H6789>destroy<s%> <S%H341>me<s%>, being my enemies <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%>, are <S%H6105>mighty<s%>: then I <S%H7725>restored<s%> that which I took not <S%H1497>away<s%>.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, you <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H200>foolishness<s%>; and my <S%H819>sins<s%> are not hid from <S%H3582>you<s%>.

Let not them that <S%H6960>wait<s%> on <S%H136>you<s%>, O Lord <S%H3069>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for my <S%H1245>sake<s%>: let not those that seek you be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for my <S%H430>sake<s%>, O God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Because for your sake I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; <S%H3639>shame<s%> has <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>.
I am become a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> unto my <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and an <S%H5237>alien<s%> unto my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
For the <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> has eaten me <S%H398>up<s%>; and the <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> of them that <S%H2778>reproached<s%> you are fallen upon <S%H5307>me<s%>.
When I <S%H1058>wept<s%>, and chastened my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting<s%>, that was to my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.
I <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> also my <S%H3830>garment<s%>; and I became a proverb to <S%H4912>them<s%>.
They that sit <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H7878>speak<s%> against <S%H5058>me<s%>; and I was the song of the <S%H8354>drunkards<s%>.

But as for <S%H8605>me<s%>, my prayer is unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, in a <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%>: O <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H571>me<s%>, in the truth of your <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H2916>mire<s%>, and let me not <S%H2883>sink<s%>: let me be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H4615>me<s%>, and out of the deep <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

Let not the <S%H4325>waterflood<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> <S%H4688>me<s%>, neither let the deep swallow me <S%H1104>up<s%>, and let not the <S%H875>pit<s%> <S%H332>shut<s%> her mouth upon <S%H6310>me<s%>.

<S%H6030>Hear<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord; for your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto me according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%>.
And <S%H5641>hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> from your <S%H5650>servant<s%>; for I am in <S%H6887>trouble<s%>: <S%H6030>hear<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily<s%>.
Draw <S%H7126>near<s%> unto my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H6299>it<s%>: deliver me because of my <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
You have <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, and my <S%H1322>shame<s%>, and my <S%H3639>dishonor<s%>: my adversaries are all before <S%H6887>you<s%>.

<S%H2781>Reproach<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and I am full of <S%H5136>heaviness<s%>: and I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for some to take <S%H5110>pity<s%>, but there was <S%H5162>none<s%>; and for comforters, but I found <S%H4672>none<s%>.
They <S%H5414>gave<s%> me also <S%H7219>gall<s%> for my <S%H1267>food<s%>; and in my <S%H6772>thirst<s%> they gave me <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>.
Let their <S%H7979>table<s%> become a <S%H6341>snare<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7965>them<s%>: and that which should have been for their welfare, let it become a <S%H4170>trap<s%>.
Let their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened<s%>, that they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4975>not<s%>; and make their body <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H4571>shake<s%>.
Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H2195>indignation<s%> upon <S%H2740>them<s%>, and let your wrathful <S%H639>anger<s%> take hold of <S%H5381>them<s%>.
Let their <S%H2918>habitation<s%> be <S%H8074>desolate<s%>; and let none <S%H3427>live<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
For they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> him whom you have <S%H5221>struck<s%>; and they <S%H5608>talk<s%> to the <S%H4341>grief<s%> of those whom you have <S%H2491>wounded<s%>.
<S%H5414>Add<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> unto their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: and let them not <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
Let them be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>, and not be <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H3510>sorrowful<s%>: let your <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, set me up on <S%H7682>high<s%>.
I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H7892>song<s%>, and will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him with <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>.
This also shall <S%H3190>please<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3190>better<s%> than a <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H6499>bullock<s%> that has <S%H7160>horns<s%> and <S%H6536>hoofs<s%>.
The <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H8055>this<s%>, and be glad: and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H34>poor<s%>, and <S%H959>despises<s%> not his <S%H615>prisoners<s%>.
Let the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3220>him<s%>, the seas, and every thing that moves in <S%H7430>it<s%>.

For <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and will <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: that they may <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H3423>there<s%>, and have it in possession.
The <S%H2233>seed<s%> also of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H157>it<s%>: and they that love his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall live in <S%H7931>it<s%>.
